content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Electric pole (position x1)
-  Electric pole (position x2)
-  Electric pole (position x3)

### Copper plate factory at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 12
-  Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) - Status: FULL_OUTPUT, Fuel: 6
-  Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS, Fuel: 20
-  Chest (position 5.5, 0.5) - Status: NORMAL, Inventory: {'iron-plate': 160}
-  Lab (position 6.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_POWER, Research: automation

### Copper ore mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Burner mining drill (position x1)
-  Burner mining drill (position x2)

### Iron ore mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
-  Burner mining drill (position x1)
-  Burner mining drill (position x2)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure that all electric entities are connected to a power source to avoid power-related issues.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to crafting items
- Verify that you have the necessary ingredients before attempting to craft items.
